Question: Vox AI CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Vox AI

Vox AI Drive-Thru Technology

- Advanced machine learning technology designed for seamless restaurant drive-thru orders
- Efficient, conversational, and speaks 35 languages
- Relieves overworked employees, boosts revenues by up to 17%, and increases ROI by 14 times
- Demonstrated at CES Unveiled Las Vegas and NL Tech Pavilion in Eureka Park at the Venetian Expo, Booth 62100
- Currently in the midst of a proof-of-concept pilot with one of the world's largest fast food chains
Summary_cn:
Vox AI

Vox AI自助点餐技术

- 先进的机器学习技术，用于无缝点餐系统
- 高效、会话式，支持35种语言
- 缓解员工工作负担，提高营收17%，ROI增加14倍
- 在CES Unveiled Las Vegas和NL Tech Pavilion做了示范，位于Eureka Park的Venetian Expo，62100展位
- 目前正在与全球最大的快餐连锁店之一进行概念验证试点
